image_1.description: Lake Powell is a large body of water with a dark blue color, nestled within a vast desert landscape on the Arizona-Utah border. The lake, which is a reservoir on the Colorado River, is surrounded by rugged, sandstone cliffs that have been eroded into unique formations and is currently facing a crisis with water levels at 28 percent of total capacity due to the river's diminished flow and increased demand.

image_6.description: Sabrina Ionescu is a player relied upon by the Liberty in the W.N.B.A. playoffs, having a breakout season in her third year, and is recognized as Player 1 from image_6.
